abstract: For one thing, stick with Drake.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — ﻿Meghan, Harry. I hear you’re ditching your royal titles and moving to Canada. And why not? You met there, the summers are lovely, and the country is not actively crowdsourcing “bong money” to make sure a big bell goes off at the precise moment it throws itself into international disarray. Plus, there is the matter of your family’s longstanding history as merciless imperialists and a swathe of British citizens and newspapers who, for reasons that couldn’t possibly be racism, have harangued, harassed and libeled you both into the ground. This, combined with how good I know you both look in winter hats, makes me think it will be a very fruitful move indeed.
